Preface This book takes a project-oriented approach to present and explain data-science skills/principles using data related to FIFA world cup. The following are the main topics that we will explore: History of hosting FIFA World Cup How to read this book? This book was written with beginner R users in mind. Long wrangling pipes and ggplot constructions are avoided and instead broken into sequential, small, and intuitive steps. This doesnâ€™t mean that the analysis is limited to basic methods and simple workflow. Rather the goal is go a long distance to explain the relevant details in a clear and easy-to-follow. This book is part of Cairo Data Science Club, an ambitious community driven initiative aimed at spreading data-science skills and promoting data culture!
